alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Faulkner (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 7:08PM CDT until June 15 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN VAN BUREN...SOUTHWESTERN CLEBURNE...NORTHEASTERN FAULKNER AND WEST CENTRAL WHITE COUNTIES... At 707 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Damascus, or 16 miles south of Clinton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Greenbrier... Quitman... Guy... Rose Bud... Damascus... Enola... Twin Groves... Mount Vernon... Fairbanks... Whipple... Woolly Hollow State Park... Holland... Bee Branch... Barney... Southside in Van Buren County... Enders... Pearson... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
